nproc_per_node.name: nproc_per_node
nproc_per_node.description: Number of processes to launch on each node

nnodes.name: nnodes
nnodes.description: Number of nodes to use for distributed training

master_addr.name: master_addr
master_addr.description: Master node TCP/IP address for torch native backends (mandatory if you have filled number of nodes)

master_port.name: master_port
master_port.description: Master node port for torch native backends (mandatory if you have filled number of nodes)

save_training.name: save_training
save_training.description: Save the training state by every save_every_iters.

save_evaluation.name: save_evaluation
save_evaluation.description: Save the model(s) by best evaluation metric score.

terminate_on_nan.name: terminate_on_nan
terminate_on_nan.description: Stop the training if there is Inf/NaN tensor found.

timer.name: timer
timer.description: Measure (average) time between events using Timer handler.

patience.name: patience
patience.description: Number of events to wait if no improvement and then stop the training.

filename_prefix.name: filename_prefix
filename_prefix.description: What prefix would you like to put in front of saved checkpoint file?

n_saved.name: n_saved
n_saved.description: How many checkpoint file would you like to keep on disk?

limit_sec.name: limit_sec
limit_sec.description: How long do you want to run for the training and then terminate?
